hero.description: Discover superior quality welding machines, designed to offer unmatched reliability and efficiency. Whether you are a professional or an enthusiast, we have the ideal solution for your welding needs.

about.title: About
about.feature1Desc: At IRON, we rigorously select reliable and efficient welding machines, suitable for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts.
about.feature2Desc: We ensure fast shipping of your orders, with transparent tracking until delivery.
about.feature3Desc: No hidden fees, clear descriptions and honest advice to help you make the best choice.
about.feature4Desc: We listen to your feedback to continuously improve our offer and services.
about.value1Desc: We focus on the finest details to ensure impeccable quality.
about.value2Desc: Built to last, our equipment withstands the most demanding conditions.
about.value3Desc: Our dedicated team is committed to providing the best service and after-sales support.
about.value4Desc: We stay at the forefront of welding technology and safety.

blog.title: Blog
blog.postTitle: How to choose the right welding machine for your business
blog.postContent: Choosing the right welding machine for your professional needs can make all the difference in terms of quality, productivity and safety. It is important to consider several criteria: the type of welding desired (MIG, TIG or arc), the frequency of use, the power required, and the type of materials you will be welding. A well-chosen machine will allow you to obtain clean and durable welds, while ensuring efficient work. Do not hesitate to ask professionals for advice or compare technical specifications to make the best choice.
blog.commentPrompt: If you have any questions, feel free to send us a message
